thread.title: Wade goes Miami with outfit choice in Chicago
thread.title_full: Wade goes Miami with outfit choice in Chicago

author: USA TODAY
title: Wade goes Miami with outfit choice in Chicago
text:
Wade goes Miami with outfit choice in Chicago Looking good, Dwyane Wade. Post to Facebook Wade goes Miami with outfit choice in Chicago Looking good, Dwyane Wade.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/dwyane-wade-fashion-outfit-short-sleeve-blazer-miami-south-beach-fans-bulls-chicago-return-jokes-twitter   Join the Nation's Conversation   Wade goes Miami with outfit choice in Chicago Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 11:20 p.m. ET March 22, 2017 
Dwyane Wade, who's out for the season with an elbow injury , decided to go with a short sleeve blazer on Wednesday night when the Bulls beat the Pistons in Chicago. As they noted on the broadcast, Wade looked ready to go out to the clubs in South Beach. D-Wade came out South Beach ready...ðŸŒ´ pic.twitter.com/k8NfHJrw5f â€” Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) March 23, 2017 
Twitter cracked a few jokes. The outfit really is something. Wade is one of the more fashion-forward players in the NBA. 
Some said that the outfit seemed to be inspired by Drake's new album, More Life . dwayne wade dressed like how listening to "passionfruit" makes me feel pic.twitter.com/on13W0tRob â€” Rikky! Rikki! RikkÃ¨! (@rwxoxo) March 23, 2017 30 degrees in Chicago but Dwyane Wade listened to 'More Life' all weekend soâ€¦. pic.twitter.com/hGioE5cEG1 â€” Def Pen Hoops (@DefPenHoops) March 23, 2017 
Others tweeted about how Miami Wade looked - so Miami that maybe he should think about returning to the Heat where he won three championships . You can take the Dwyane Wade out of Miami, but you can't take the Miami Vice out of D-Wade. https://t.co/TsnL2m8fuf â€” Ben Rohrbach (@brohrbach) March 23, 2017 You can take the man out of Miami but you can't take the Miami out of the man @DwyaneWade https://t.co/5otmuRnFUC â€” Devin Perez (@DevinPerez15) March 23, 2017 @DwyaneWade is immune to the Chicago Winter. Lol https://t.co/GwmQymovbQ â€” Derek Jamal (@D_Jamal21) March 23, 2017 Lmaooo Miami misses you, come back ðŸ¤— @DwyaneWade https://t.co/bFagpmh0TK â€” Yvonne Marie (@Its_YvonneMarie) March 23, 2017 Hey @DwyaneWade everyone in Miami loves the look! #Miami https://t.co/zJUhEbhsNJ
